Detailed Description

Piecewise linear additive spike response.

The shape of the spike response is defined by an array of amplitudes and an array of time spans . The PSP amplitude at time after a spike was triggered is , that at time is . The PSP amplitudes are linearly interpolated between and . The PSP amplitudes between and are constant . If a spike occurs while the response is active the overlapping spike responses are added up.

See also:
PLResetKernelSpikeResponse
